SRS: Processing personal data in the SRS
title: Title
name: Name Surname
adminMessagePage: This is Admin view with strict access. Please read instructions before starting the election.
voterMessagePage: This is Voter view with strict access. Please read instructions before starting the election.
policiesAgreement: I confirm that I agree to all policies and deposit terms.
contactSupport: Please contact support team in case you have some questions!
inform&methodmetrials: Ed informational and methodological materials as well as descriptions of XML forms of electronic documents are available on the SRS website. <link1>Electronic Declaration systems</link1>
sanctions: We recall it is prohibited for goods subject to their sanctions to draw up an import customs declaration. This applies to the cargo and mail of legal and natural persons. More broadly, <link1>on the SRS website</link1>. Criminal liability is provided for violations of sanctions.
misitryMessage: The Ministry of Smart Administration and Regional Development calls for the use of: Official electronic address (e-address). Using an E-address is mandatory for all businesses and some individuals. Learn more, consult, and create an e-address with information. <link1>Latvija.gov.lv.</link1>
eligibleEditions: We're letting you know the 'Eligible Editions' Mobile App doesn't work on phones with the Android operating system. We invite eligible extract documents to be submitted to EDS in a similar way to the Mobile App. More information. <link1>On the SRS website.</link1>
encpurageMessage: We encourage you to use the <link1>www.vid.gov.lv</link1>– Database to be published – <link2>Business Receipts</link2>. The number of records registered in the database to be made public by the SRS shall be available the following day.
cacheMessage: For security reasons, we encourage your browser to regularly delete cookies and clear the cache.
mobileDevices: Internet browsers available on mobile devices (smartphones, tablets), as well as internet browsers with limited functionality, do not provide training sections for e-learning.
candidateDataRequired: Please fill out all candidate fields.
saltDescription: This salt ensures privacy. Save it securely — it’s required to reveal your vote later.
downloadFileSaltDescription: Do you want to download your salt file for safekeeping?
successWithdrawTransaction: Transaction successfull! Please check government account.
sucessOpenRevealPhase: Election is set to Revealing stage!
userViewMessage: This is {{role}} view. Please read instructions before voting

error.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred during login.
error.contactSupport: If the problem persists, please contact support.

contractErrors.votingIsNotAllowed: Voting is not allowed anymore! Time is up!
contractErrors.revealStageHasNotStarted: Reveal stage has not started yet!
contractErrors.onlyOwner: Only owner can call this function!
contractErrors.governmentAccountConstraint: Government Account cannot participate in voting!
contractErrors.noPrevVote: You have not voted earlier, you cannot reveal any vote!
contractErrors.candidateIsNotFound: Candidate does not exist with this id!
